Bash(/c/Users/themi/PycharmProjects/Socrates/pytest.ini <<'EOF'
[pytest]
# Pytest configuration for Socrates project

# Minimum pytest version
minversion = 7.0

# Test discovery paths
testpaths = tests

# Python files patterns
python_files = test_*.py
python_classes = Test*
python_functions = test_*

# Markers for test categorization
markers =
    unit: Unit tests \(fast, isolated, no external deps\)
    integration: Integration tests \(test component interactions\)
    e2e: End-to-end tests \(full user workflows\)
    slow: Tests that take >1 second
    api: API endpoint tests
    database: Database operation tests
    cache: Cache/redis tests
    auth: Authentication tests
    async: Async operation tests
    mock: Tests using mocks
    requires_api: Tests requiring external API keys
    requires_db: Tests requiring database

# Command line options \(can be overridden\)
addopts =
    --strict-markers
    --strict-config
    --verbose
    -ra
    --maxfail=10
    --tb=short
    --disable-warnings

# Coverage options
[coverage:run]
branch = True
omit =
    */venv/*
    */site-packages/*
    */test_*.py
    */__pycache__/*
    */migrations/*

[coverage:report]
exclude_lines =
    pragma: no cover
    def __repr__
    raise AssertionError
    raise NotImplementedError
    if __name__ == .__main__.:
    if TYPE_CHECKING:
    @abstractmethod
    @abc.abstractmethod
    @property

precision = 2
skip_covered = False

[coverage:html]
directory = htmlcov
EOF)

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
import sqlite3

db_path = r''C:\\Users\\themi\\.socrates\\projects.db''
conn = sqlite3.connect\(db_path\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# Check if tables exist
cursor.execute\(""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table''""\)
tables = cursor.fetchall\(\)
print\(''Tables in database:''\)
for table in tables:
    print\(f''  - {table[0]}''\)

# Check projects
print\(''\\nProjects in database:''\)
try:
    cursor.execute\(''SELECT id, name FROM projects LIMIT 10''\)
    projects = cursor.fetchall\(\)
    if projects:
        for proj in projects:
            print\(f''  - {proj[0]}: {proj[1]}''\)
    else:
        print\(''  \(No projects found\)''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''  Error: {e}''\)

# Check users
print\(''\\nUsers in database:''\)
try:
    cursor.execute\(''SELECT id, username FROM users LIMIT 10''\)
    users = cursor.fetchall\(\)
    if users:
        for user in users:
            print\(f''  - {user[0]}: {user[1]}''\)
    else:
        print\(''  \(No users found\)''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''  Error: {e}''\)

conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
import sqlite3

db_path = r''C:\\Users\\themi\\.socrates\\projects.db''
conn = sqlite3.connect\(db_path\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# Check projects_v2 schema
print\(''projects_v2 columns:''\)
cursor.execute\(''PRAGMA table_info\(projects_v2\)''\)
for col in cursor.fetchall\(\):
    print\(f''  - {col[1]} \({col[2]}\)''\)

# Check users_v2 schema
print\(''\\nusers_v2 columns:''\)
cursor.execute\(''PRAGMA table_info\(users_v2\)''\)
for col in cursor.fetchall\(\):
    print\(f''  - {col[1]} \({col[2]}\)''\)

# Check refresh_tokens schema
print\(''\\nrefresh_tokens columns:''\)
cursor.execute\(''PRAGMA table_info\(refresh_tokens\)''\)
for col in cursor.fetchall\(\):
    print\(f''  - {col[1]} \({col[2]}\)''\)

# Get actual data from projects_v2
print\(''\\nData in projects_v2:''\)
cursor.execute\(''SELECT * FROM projects_v2 LIMIT 3''\)
rows = cursor.fetchall\(\)
if rows:
    print\(f''  Found {len\(rows\)} row\(s\)''\)
    for row in rows:
        print\(f''  {row[:3]}...''\)  # Show first 3 columns
else:
    print\(''  \(Empty\)''\)

# Get actual data from users_v2
print\(''\\nData in users_v2:''\)
cursor.execute\(''SELECT * FROM users_v2 LIMIT 3''\)
rows = cursor.fetchall\(\)
if rows:
    print\(f''  Found {len\(rows\)} row\(s\)''\)
    for row in rows:
        print\(f''  {row[:3]}...''\)
else:
    print\(''  \(Empty\)''\)

conn.close\(\)
")
